{"step_by_step_thinking": "According to the relevant documents, dry heat sterilization is a longer process compared to moist heat sterilization. It requires higher temperatures and longer exposure times. However, there is no mention of it being ineffective in sterilization. There is also no mention of it rusting or dulling the instruments.
